summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Money Tracker application. Backend APIs are fully functional (100% success rate), but frontend has critical modal interaction issues preventing CRUD operations through UI.

ui_bugs.issue: Dialog overlay intercepting pointer events, preventing form interactions
ui_bugs.selector: DialogOverlay with class 'fixed inset-0 z-50 bg-black/80'
ui_bugs.impact: Users cannot create transactions, categories, or users through UI

ui_bugs.issue: Select dropdown options not clickable due to overlay issues

integration_issues.issue: Modal forms cannot be submitted due to overlay blocking interactions
Add category modal has same overlay interaction problem
Create user modal affected by same overlay issue

passed_tests: Dashboard stats display (income: Rp 5.000.000, expense: Rp 50.000, balance: Rp 4.950.000)
All backend CRUD operations (GET, POST, PUT, DELETE)

success_percentage.frontend: 60% (read operations work, CRUD operations blocked by modal issues)

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Fix modal dialog overlay issue preventing form interactions. The DialogOverlay component is intercepting pointer events and blocking all form submissions in modals. This affects transaction creation/editing, category creation, and user creation. All backend APIs work perfectly, but UI is unusable for CRUD operations.
